message.body: i really hate it here ! i really wanna come home midge ! like im cryin
Just remember the first couple months are different. You gotta hang in there. It will get better when you get a better feel for the new environment

I hated ccp when I started but then it wasn't so bad.. I hated Drexel even more than ccp. After two years I still didn't like it but it wasn't as bad as when I started. It all came down to I didn't get involved while on campus. I commuted so didn't make friends bec I was home and I worked so had to leave campus immediately rather than hanging out
Just do you.. youll meet all the right ppl and have fun (w out needing to party excessively)... it will get better
okay im gonna try to like itttt. !
